WorkItem.Description: A project by the name of "Host and use WCF Services in Windows Azure (VBAzureWCFServices)" appears listed when clicking the C# tab of the Sample Browser.
WorkItem.Summary: Sample Browser C# tab retrieves VB project

Comments.Message:
hi nanotaboada,

Thank you for using our code sample request service. 

I have informed my project manager the day before yesterday. The issue about our sample browse would be resolve by this tools' programmer. Thanks for your concern. And your screenshots would provide enormate help for our work. In the future we will improve the quality of 1code quickly.
